group_1.textRight: (Next time I'm going to do it...@I'll say hello in a louder voice.)

group_1.narration: At my favorite stationary store.@Straight through the door, right at@the wall, the last shelf in the back.
There's row after row of colored pencils.
I write in my diary every day without fail.@I always draw little doodles in it.@And that's where I buy the colored@pencils that I use to draw them.

group_1.textLeft: I... I tried to...@I tried to jump...off the roof?!

group_1.narration: I managed to save someone again.
On days like this,@I buy a colored pencil.@It's a personal tradition.

group_1.textCenter: *Sniff, sniff*@I'm so glad I didn't die!

group_1.narration: When I feel like I managed to bring color@back into the life of someone who was@about to be crushed by darkness...
I add another color to my own@collection of colored pencils.@It just feels… Right.

group_1.textLeft: Hey! That skirt!@Isn't it, like, super cute?!
Oh, but then again…@I bought a pink one the other day.
[chara:303101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Sure! I love pink! It's my favorite!

group_1.textCenter: (Cherry pink...@I think I'll go with this color today...)

group_1.narration: Rika is always so cheerful.@She's easy to talk to too, so@she's got lots and lots of friends.
Me, on the other hand, I'm shy and@nervous and have trouble talking to people.@We're total opposites.
I don’t feel like I even@deserve to be by her side.
Sometimes I wonder if just being@seen with me might somehow@be embarrassing for her.
The truth is, that's how@unsure of myself I still am.
The colors in my desk drawer@increase one by one...@They're proof that I managed to@help someone at least a little bit.
Seeing all the different@colors gives me confidence.
Each time I see the drawer get@more vibrant and colorful...
It makes me think I'm becoming the kind@of girl that deserves to be by her side...@But...

group_1.textCenter: (I wonder what I should@write in my diary today...)

group_1.narration: But I still want to keep this@hope of mine a secret from her.
